data.title: Register to vote in your state
data.meta_description: Find the information you need to make registration and voting easy. Official voter registration website of the United States government.
data.text:
State and local elections

Learn about elections for governor, mayor, and local offices.

Presidential election process

Learn about the timeline in a presidential election cycle.

Primaries and caucuses

Learn how political parties choose candidates for the presidential election.

Congressional and midterm elections

Learn about elections for the U.S. House of Representatives and the U.S. Senate.

Electoral college

Learn how the president and vice president are selected.
